definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: I want an amethyst ring, but I do not know what my ring size is.
sentences.chinese: 我要一只紫水晶戒指，但是我不知道我的戒指尺码。

sentences.english: Amethyst assists in learning the frequencies necessary for the transcendence of karma.
sentences.chinese: 紫水晶协助学习业力超越所必须的频率。

sentences.english: It is all related therefore in the perception of the Amethyst Quartz Kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 因此紫水晶国王觉察到，一切都相关。

sentences.english: I had bought the small bottle of perfume the summer before last: Bvlgari's 'Amethyst'.
sentences.chinese: 右边是我前年夏天买的名为“紫水晶”的小瓶香水。

sentences.english: This antiqued copper tone necklace is combined with regal amethyst purple beads and crystals.
sentences.chinese: 这仿古铜铃声项链是结合富豪紫水晶紫色珠子和水晶。

sentences.english: Most of it is variety of amethyst: that heat has turned brown.
sentences.chinese: 大多数石英是一种紫水晶，高温使其变为棕色。

sentences.english: Most of it is a variety of amethyst : that heat turned brown.
sentences.chinese: 大多数石英是一种紫水晶，高温使其变为棕色。

sentences.english: The exquisite flowers come alive in shades of fuchsia and amethyst.
sentences.chinese: 细腻的花朵装点在色调的紫红色以及紫水晶。

definition: citrine (orange or yellow quartz SiO2 as a semiprecious stone)
lapis lazuli (mineral of the square albite family)
